eventtitle: Desert Drip Fest Las Vegas | Let's Get Drippy | SZN2
eventDescripton:
Event Details
Desert Drip is BACK! 8 Parties | 8 Artists | 1 Low Price
Desert Drip Fest | SZN2 | Summer 2022
Lineup includes: DJ Diesel, Kim Lee, Deux Twins, Justin Credible AND more to come!
Las Vegas boasts some of the biggest pool parties and nightclubs in the world and planning your epic weekend can get time consuming, tricky and expensive.
Desert Drip is the most cost effective and hassle-free way to experience Las Vegas. Leave the party and artist selection up to us, while your Festival Pass grants you free and express entry to the busiest parties in Sin City.
Official Artist & Venue Lineups will be announced on DesertDripFest.com
Please visit our Info Section for festival FAQ's, Rules and Guidelines to ensure your Vegas weekend is the most epic experience.

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 8 pm
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN SOLD OUT
Place yourself at the epicenter of action with our Poolside tables. Tucked between colossal palm trees under a blanket of stars, you'll find yourself facing our towering DJ booth while surrounded by bottles popping and twin pools reflecting the multitude of Vegas lights. Put your feet in the pool and relax while watching the thousands of LEDs flashing inside, or dance around the pool deck.
Bungalow
10 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN SOLD OUT
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches
VIP Balcony
6 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN SOLD OUT
Our VIP Balcony tables provide you with a surreal birds eye view of the venue seemingly pulled straight from a movie classic. Enjoy your evening in the privacy of this exclusive space overlooking the entire venue. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue; all while you watch confetti and cryo rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Banquette
6 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
Position yourself on plush black with pink trim couches at the Banquette tables and enjoy views of 7,000 square feet of LED, confetti showers, cryo-cannons, and more. Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 9 am
Mezzanine VIP Day Bed
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Resting in this bastion of leisure, the Mezzanine Day Beds place you and you guests at the highest point in the venue. Encircling our exclusive 11th story private pool, any direction you turn will tempt your jaw to drop at the sights: picturesque views of the club to one side and serene vistas of the sun drenched strip on the other. Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
Position yourself around one of our pools and rest upon our couches and lounge chairs at your Poolside Banquette table. Enjoy views of champagne showers, dancers in the water, and a direct line of site to a world-renowned DJ. From here you are witness to the entire Beach Club, just a short to the dance floor and with easy access to the pool.
Day Bed
8 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
When you are lying on our Day Beds overlooking the strip and stretched out before the city's greatest rooftop party, you may have a hard time remembering this is real life. Our Day Beds, overlooking the main pools, provide an unrivaled view of the strip and the entire venue. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and multiple bedside tables. A great place to mingle, you'll additionally have easy access to the rest of the venue.
Pool Deck Booth
10 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
Our Pool Deck Booths place you eye-level with the party, pools, and elegance of Drai's world-class venue. Each of these spacious booths provides ample seating among some of the Beach Clubs most highly demanded real estate. You're view will blanket banks of waving palm trees over a thousand guests, with views of the strip in the background. Each of these booths has devoted storage areas.
Mezzanine Cabana
12 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
Our North Mezzanine Cabanas place you on another level of luxury and privacy. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Your gaze will be met with spellbinding views of the entire venue oscillating between hard drops and bass lines. Turn elsewhere and your sights will embrace the city towering beyond. Lounge on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of your cabana and let the party come to you. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Daybed
- 2 couches
XSET Gaming Club Cabana
12 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
The crowning jewel of Drai's rooftop oasis, the Mezzanine Grand Cabana provides an unrivaled view encompassing the entire venue and strip beyond. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Lounge out on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of Drai's largest cabana. Two nearby staircases provide easy access to the rest of the venue. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screen
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Misters
- Daybed
- 3 couches
Bungalow
15 GUESTS | $6,500.00 MIN
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches

Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Event Details
Las Vegas transportation services offered in this limousine type include:
Point to point services:
Single stop trips made easy and convenient, as our service can drop you off and pick you up later on.
Dedicated chauffeur services:
Have the convenience of a dedicated Chauffeur for several hours or for the day as your agenda can change from one moment to the next.
Disclaimer:
* Hourly rates do not include driver gratuity, Nevada excise tax, fees or applicable fuel surcharges.
* Fuel surcharges are subject to change.
* This party bus requires a minimum 2-hour booking.
† Complimentary champagne requires a minimum of 2-hour booking.

Event Details
Celebrate over 30 years of Perfecto Records with label head-honcho Paul Oakenfold and Liquid Todd as they take over the outdoor stage in the A-Lot at AREA15 on Saturday, August 6 at 10 PM.
EVENT DETAILS & RESTRICTIONS
· Doors open at 9:30 PM.
· Must be 21+ with a valid ID or driver’s license to enter.

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 8 pm
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Place yourself at the epicenter of action with our Poolside tables. Tucked between colossal palm trees under a blanket of stars, you'll find yourself facing our towering DJ booth while surrounded by bottles popping and twin pools reflecting the multitude of Vegas lights. Put your feet in the pool and relax while watching the thousands of LEDs flashing inside, or dance around the pool deck.
VIP Balcony
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Our VIP Balcony tables provide you with a surreal birds eye view of the venue seemingly pulled straight from a movie classic. Enjoy your evening in the privacy of this exclusive space overlooking the entire venue. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue; all while you watch confetti and cryo rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Celebrity
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
These secluded booths provide opportunities for the privacy and intimacy many venues lack. From this height, Drai's elegant landscape of premier design becomes unmistakable. Look over your balcony onto this vessel of teeming life, sound, and light. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Banquette
6 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Position yourself on plush black with pink trim couches at the Banquette tables and enjoy views of 7,000 square feet of LED, confetti showers, cryo-cannons, and more. From here you are witness to the entire club, while you sit just a short walk from the dance floor. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Mezzanine Booth
8 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
These secluded booths provide opportunities for the privacy and intimacy many venues lack. From this height, Drai's elegant landscape of premier design becomes unmistakable. Look over your balcony onto this vessel of teeming life, sound, and light. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Bungalow
10 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches
Elevated VIP Booth
10 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
Take it all in from our spacious Elevated VIP Booths. Ringing the main floor perimeter of the Nightclub, these booths offer an unimpeded glimpse of the entire venue, inside and out. Only yards away sit the DJ stage and dance floor where you will have a staggering view of one of the largest LED systems in the world. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Patio Dance Floor
14 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: Command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 10 guests in the center of it all.
VIP Dance Floor Table
10 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 6 guests with devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Upper Dance Floor Table
12 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
Supplying seated and standing room for 10 guests, the Upper Dance Floor tables place you in a prime position over the dance floor. A sight of sensory saturation and unbridled energy, these tables have only one point of entry, putting you in charge of who comes in and out of your space. Each of these tables possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Dance Floor Table
14 GUESTS | $6,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 10 guests with devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
The King's Table
16 GUESTS | $8,000.00 MIN
Supplying seated and standing room for 10 guests, the Upper Dance Floor tables place you in a prime position over the dance floor. A sight of sensory saturation and unbridled energy, these tables have only one point of entry, putting you in charge of who comes in and out of your space. Each of these tables possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Stage
7 GUESTS | $50,000.00 MIN
Take your night to the next level at our Stage tables. Located immediately behind the entrancing melodies of the worlds most revered DJs, you will find yourself overlooking the entire party. Entry to this section is controlled by our security staff, keeping you and your guests in comfortable privacy. This section has unprecedented views of the entertainment capital of the planet for a backdrop and one of the most meticulously planned venues ever conceived to the fore. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

Event Details
Step into the mind of Alien8 as we take you on a journey through time & space; 15 DJ's, 3 stages, 1 infinite universe.
Enter the realm of the "Antimatter" where normalcy has no define meaning. Get ready to feel the vibrations of Bass House all night long as some of the hottest Las Vegas artists get groovy on the dance floor. Performances by: TBA.
Do you have what it takes to travel through the "Black Hole"? Enter the territory unknown to man & find yourself on the other side; where Acid fills the air; all while shuffling the night away with performances by: TBA.
Make your way out to the "Nebula" for some Open House. Find yourselves floating through the crowd as you let the music take control, that is if you can find the secret area near the pool. Performances by: TBA.
Throughout the venue you will come across one of many local vendors selling merchandise and food such as: MoonFazed, Pop of Design & Redd Apparel (Alien8 Official Merchandise).
General Admission Includes:
Access To Nightclub & All General Admission Areas Throughout The Venue
Re-entry Into The Venue

Las Vegas transportation services offered in this limousine type include:
Point to point services:
Single stop trips made easy and convenient, as our service can drop you off and pick you up later on.

Have the convenience of a dedicated Chauffeur for several hours or for the day as your agenda can change from one moment to the next.

Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.

- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 9 am
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Position yourself around one of our pools and rest upon our couches and lounge chairs at your Poolside Banquette table. Enjoy views of champagne showers, dancers in the water, and a direct line of site to a world-renowned DJ. From here you are witness to the entire Beach Club, just a short to the dance floor and with easy access to the pool.
Mezzanine VIP Day Bed
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Resting in this bastion of leisure, the Mezzanine Day Beds place you and you guests at the highest point in the venue. Encircling our exclusive 11th story private pool, any direction you turn will tempt your jaw to drop at the sights: picturesque views of the club to one side and serene vistas of the sun drenched strip on the other. Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.
Day Bed
8 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
When you are lying on our Day Beds overlooking the strip and stretched out before the city's greatest rooftop party, you may have a hard time remembering this is real life. Our Day Beds, overlooking the main pools, provide an unrivaled view of the strip and the entire venue. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and multiple bedside tables. A great place to mingle, you'll additionally have easy access to the rest of the venue.
Pool Deck Booth
10 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
Our Pool Deck Booths place you eye-level with the party, pools, and elegance of Drai's world-class venue. Each of these spacious booths provides ample seating among some of the Beach Clubs most highly demanded real estate. You're view will blanket banks of waving palm trees over a thousand guests, with views of the strip in the background. Each of these booths has devoted storage areas.
Mezzanine Cabana
12 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
Our North Mezzanine Cabanas place you on another level of luxury and privacy. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Your gaze will be met with spellbinding views of the entire venue oscillating between hard drops and bass lines. Turn elsewhere and your sights will embrace the city towering beyond. Lounge on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of your cabana and let the party come to you. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Daybed
- 2 couches
XSET Gaming Club Cabana
12 GUESTS | $4,500.00 MIN SOLD OUT
The crowning jewel of Drai's rooftop oasis, the Mezzanine Grand Cabana provides an unrivaled view encompassing the entire venue and strip beyond. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Lounge out on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of Drai's largest cabana. Two nearby staircases provide easy access to the rest of the venue. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom

eventtitle: Candlelight: The Best of Hans Zimmer
eventDescripton:
Event Details
⭐ Candlelight concerts bring the magic of a live, multi-sensory musical experience to awe-inspiring locations like never seen before in Las Vegas. Get your tickets now to discover the music of Hans Zimmer at The Industrial under the gentle glow of candlelight.
General Info
📍 Venue: The INDUSTRIAL Las Vegas
📅 Date and times: August 19 at 6:00 p.m. and 8:30 p.m. (select during purchase)
⏳ Duration: 65 minutes (doors open 45 mins prior to the start time and late entry is not permitted)
👤 Age requirement: 8 years old or older. Anyone under the age of 16 must be accompanied by an adult
♿ Accessibility: this venue is wheelchair accessible
❓ View the FAQs for this event here
✔️ Safety measures will be in place throughout the experience
🪑 Seating is assigned on a first come first served basis in each zone
🕯️ If you would like to book a private concert, please click here

Vibe to the voices dancing inside your head as emerging singer, songwriter, and producer, Mindchatter takes over the Portal with a visually stimulating live performance on Friday, August 19.
EVENT DETAILS & RESTRICTIONS
Doors open at 8:30 PM.
Must be 18+ with a valid ID or driver’s license to enter.
Must be 21+ to consume alcohol.

Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Mezzanine VIP Day Bed
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Resting in this bastion of leisure, the Mezzanine Day Beds place you and you guests at the highest point in the venue. Encircling our exclusive 11th story private pool, any direction you turn will tempt your jaw to drop at the sights: picturesque views of the club to one side and serene vistas of the sun drenched strip on the other. Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
Position yourself around one of our pools and rest upon our couches and lounge chairs at your Poolside Banquette table. Enjoy views of champagne showers, dancers in the water, and a direct line of site to a world-renowned DJ. From here you are witness to the entire Beach Club, just a short to the dance floor and with easy access to the pool.
Day Bed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
When you are lying on our Day Beds overlooking the strip and stretched out before the city's greatest rooftop party, you may have a hard time remembering this is real life. Our Day Beds, overlooking the main pools, provide an unrivaled view of the strip and the entire venue. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and multiple bedside tables. A great place to mingle, you'll additionally have easy access to the rest of the venue.
Pool Deck Booth
10 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Our Pool Deck Booths place you eye-level with the party, pools, and elegance of Drai's world-class venue. Each of these spacious booths provides ample seating among some of the Beach Clubs most highly demanded real estate. You're view will blanket banks of waving palm trees over a thousand guests, with views of the strip in the background. Each of these booths has devoted storage areas.
Mezzanine Cabana
12 GUESTS | $3,500.00 MIN
Our North Mezzanine Cabanas place you on another level of luxury and privacy. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Your gaze will be met with spellbinding views of the entire venue oscillating between hard drops and bass lines. Turn elsewhere and your sights will embrace the city towering beyond. Lounge on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of your cabana and let the party come to you. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Daybed
- 2 couches
Mezzanine Grand Cabana
15 GUESTS | $3,500.00 MIN
The crowning jewel of Drai's rooftop oasis, the Mezzanine Grand Cabana provides an unrivaled view encompassing the entire venue and strip beyond. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Lounge out on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of Drai's largest cabana. Two nearby staircases provide easy access to the rest of the venue. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screen
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Misters
- Daybed
- 3 couches
Bungalow
15 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches

Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 8 pm
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Place yourself at the epicenter of action with our Poolside tables. Tucked between colossal palm trees under a blanket of stars, you'll find yourself facing our towering DJ booth while surrounded by bottles popping and twin pools reflecting the multitude of Vegas lights. Put your feet in the pool and relax while watching the thousands of LEDs flashing inside, or dance around the pool deck.
VIP Balcony
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Our VIP Balcony tables provide you with a surreal birds eye view of the venue seemingly pulled straight from a movie classic. Enjoy your evening in the privacy of this exclusive space overlooking the entire venue. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue; all while you watch confetti and cryo rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Celebrity
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
These secluded booths provide opportunities for the privacy and intimacy many venues lack. From this height, Drai's elegant landscape of premier design becomes unmistakable. Look over your balcony onto this vessel of teeming life, sound, and light. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Banquette
6 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Position yourself on plush black with pink trim couches at the Banquette tables and enjoy views of 7,000 square feet of LED, confetti showers, cryo-cannons, and more. From here you are witness to the entire club, while you sit just a short walk from the dance floor. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Mezzanine Booth
8 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
These secluded booths provide opportunities for the privacy and intimacy many venues lack. From this height, Drai's elegant landscape of premier design becomes unmistakable. Look over your balcony onto this vessel of teeming life, sound, and light. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Bungalow
10 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches
Elevated VIP Booth
10 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
Take it all in from our spacious Elevated VIP Booths. Ringing the main floor perimeter of the Nightclub, these booths offer an unimpeded glimpse of the entire venue, inside and out. Only yards away sit the DJ stage and dance floor where you will have a staggering view of one of the largest LED systems in the world. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Patio Dance Floor
14 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: Command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 10 guests in the center of it all.
VIP Dance Floor Table
10 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 6 guests with devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Upper Dance Floor Table
12 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
Supplying seated and standing room for 10 guests, the Upper Dance Floor tables place you in a prime position over the dance floor. A sight of sensory saturation and unbridled energy, these tables have only one point of entry, putting you in charge of who comes in and out of your space. Each of these tables possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Dance Floor Table
14 GUESTS | $6,000.00 MIN
The Dance Floor: command center of Drai's Nightclub. With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 10 guests with devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
The King's Table
16 GUESTS | $8,000.00 MIN SOLD OUT
Supplying seated and standing room for 10 guests, the Upper Dance Floor tables place you in a prime position over the dance floor. A sight of sensory saturation and unbridled energy, these tables have only one point of entry, putting you in charge of who comes in and out of your space. Each of these tables possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Stage
7 GUESTS | $50,000.00 MIN
Take your night to the next level at our Stage tables. Located immediately behind the entrancing melodies of the worlds most revered DJs, you will find yourself overlooking the entire party. Entry to this section is controlled by our security staff, keeping you and your guests in comfortable privacy. This section has unprecedented views of the entertainment capital of the planet for a backdrop and one of the most meticulously planned venues ever conceived to the fore. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

eventDescripton:

View Resale Tickets

Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
Position yourself around one of our pools and rest upon our couches and lounge chairs at your Poolside Banquette table. Enjoy views of champagne showers, dancers in the water, and a direct line of site to a world-renowned DJ. From here you are witness to the entire Beach Club, just a short to the dance floor and with easy access to the pool.
Mezzanine VIP Day Bed
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Resting in this bastion of leisure, the Mezzanine Day Beds place you and you guests at the highest point in the venue. Encircling our exclusive 11th story private pool, any direction you turn will tempt your jaw to drop at the sights: picturesque views of the club to one side and serene vistas of the sun drenched strip on the other. Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.
Day Bed
8 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
When you are lying on our Day Beds overlooking the strip and stretched out before the city's greatest rooftop party, you may have a hard time remembering this is real life. Our Day Beds, overlooking the main pools, provide an unrivaled view of the strip and the entire venue. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and multiple bedside tables. A great place to mingle, you'll additionally have easy access to the rest of the venue.
Pool Deck Booth
10 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
Our Pool Deck Booths place you eye-level with the party, pools, and elegance of Drai's world-class venue. Each of these spacious booths provides ample seating among some of the Beach Clubs most highly demanded real estate. You're view will blanket banks of waving palm trees over a thousand guests, with views of the strip in the background. Each of these booths has devoted storage areas.
Mezzanine Cabana
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
Our North Mezzanine Cabanas place you on another level of luxury and privacy. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Your gaze will be met with spellbinding views of the entire venue oscillating between hard drops and bass lines. Turn elsewhere and your sights will embrace the city towering beyond. Lounge on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of your cabana and let the party come to you. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

Lounge out on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of Drai's largest cabana. Two nearby staircases provide easy access to the rest of the venue. Event Details
Join us on a club crawl and visit 3 nightclubs in one night. The party bus will take you to all three nightclubs.
- SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
- Thursday, Friday, and Saturday tours all start at the same location.
- 9:00-9:30pm- Check in at Blondies in the Planet Hollywood hotelPackage includes: party bus transportation to all the nightclubs, complimentary drinks on the party bus, admission to 3 nightclubs, expedited entry and your hosts for the evening.
Clubs will be 3 out of the following clubs:
- -Hakkasan nightclub
- -Jewel Nightclub
- -Marquee nightclub
- -Tao nightclub
- -Foundation Room
- - On The Record The last club is where we end the club crawl
-Must have valid ID and be in proper dress code
-Any cancellations must be made 72 hours before your scheduled club crawl and will incur a $15 cancellation fee per ticket.

eventtitle: Desert Drip Fest Las Vegas | Labor Day Wknd | SZN2
eventDescripton:
Event Details
Desert Drip is BACK! 8 Parties | 8 Artists | 1 Low Price
Desert Drip Fest | SZN2 | Summer 2022
Labor Day lineup coming soon! Past artists include: Ne-Yo, Tyga, Pusha T, DJ Diesel, Kim Lee, DJ Mustard, and many more!
Las Vegas boasts some of the biggest pool parties and nightclubs in the world and planning your epic weekend can get time consuming, tricky and expensive.
Desert Drip is the most cost effective and hassle-free way to experience Las Vegas. Leave the party and artist selection up to us, while your Festival Pass grants you free and express entry to the busiest parties in Sin City.
Official Artist & Venue Lineups will be announced on DesertDripFest.com
Please visit our Info Section for festival FAQ's, Rules and Guidelines to ensure your Vegas weekend is the most epic experience.

eventtitle: Exodus Festival Las Vegas | Labor Day Wknd | SZN12
eventDescripton:
Event Details
Las Vegas Longest Running Festival. 10 Parties | 10 Artists | 1 Low Price
Exodus Festival Las Vegas | Season 12 | Summer 2022
Labor Day lineup coming soon! Past artists include: Marshmello, Steve Aoki, Alesso, Kaskade, Diplo, The Chainsmokers, and many more!
Las Vegas boasts some of the biggest pool parties and nightclubs in the world and planning your epic weekend can get time consuming, tricky and expensive.
Exodus Festival Las Vegas, for the 12th Season running, is the most cost effective and hassle-free way to experience Las Vegas. Leave the party and DJ selection up to us, while your All Access Pass grants you free and express entry to the busiest parties in Sin City.
Official DJ & Venue Lineups will be announced on ExodusLasVegas.com
We are proud to be the most trusted festival in Vegas. Please visit our Info Section for festival FAQ's, Rules and Guidelines to ensure your Vegas weekend is the most epic experience.

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 8 pm
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Place yourself at the epicenter of action with our Poolside tables. Tucked between colossal palm trees under a blanket of stars, you'll find yourself facing our towering DJ booth while surrounded by bottles popping and twin pools reflecting the multitude of Vegas lights. Put your feet in the pool and relax while watching the thousands of LEDs flashing inside, or dance around the pool deck.
VIP Balcony
6 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
Our VIP Balcony tables provide you with a surreal birds eye view of the venue seemingly pulled straight from a movie classic. Enjoy your evening in the privacy of this exclusive space overlooking the entire venue. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue; all while you watch confetti and cryo rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Mezzanine Booth
8 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
These secluded booths provide opportunities for the privacy and intimacy many venues lack. From this height, Drai's elegant landscape of premier design becomes unmistakable. Look over your balcony onto this vessel of teeming life, sound, and light. Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
Bungalow
10 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
Located directly outside your exclusive bungalow, float in euphoric bliss in a private pool reserved for just you and your guests. Each bungalow possesses two shaded couches and 55-inch flat screens within, with more seating outside. Across the pools you will find yourself facing a world-renowned DJ, and beyond that the greatest view in the city. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- 3 couches

With a direct line of sight of the DJ booth, you'll experience confetti showers, cooling clouds of cryo, and a sea of lights featuring our million-dollar LED disco ball - the only one of its kind. Each booth comfortably seats 10 guests in the center of it all.

10 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
Take it all in from our spacious Elevated VIP Booths. Ringing the main floor perimeter of the Nightclub, these booths offer an unimpeded glimpse of the entire venue, inside and out. Only yards away sit the DJ stage and dance floor where you will have a staggering view of one of the largest LED systems in the world. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

Las Vegas transportation services offered in this limousine type include:
Point to point services:

Have the convenience of a dedicated Chauffeur for several hours or for the day as your agenda can change from one moment to the next.
Disclaimer:

* Fuel surcharges are subject to change.
* This party bus requires a minimum 2-hour booking.

Mezzanine VIP Day Bed
6 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
Resting in this bastion of leisure, the Mezzanine Day Beds place you and you guests at the highest point in the venue. Encircling our exclusive 11th story private pool, any direction you turn will tempt your jaw to drop at the sights: picturesque views of the club to one side and serene vistas of the sun drenched strip on the other. Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.
Poolside Banquette
6 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
Position yourself around one of our pools and rest upon our couches and lounge chairs at your Poolside Banquette table. Enjoy views of champagne showers, dancers in the water, and a direct line of site to a world-renowned DJ. From here you are witness to the entire Beach Club, just a short to the dance floor and with easy access to the pool.
Day Bed
8 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
When you are lying on our Day Beds overlooking the strip and stretched out before the city's greatest rooftop party, you may have a hard time remembering this is real life. Our Day Beds, overlooking the main pools, provide an unrivaled view of the strip and the entire venue. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and multiple bedside tables. A great place to mingle, you'll additionally have easy access to the rest of the venue.
Pool Deck Booth
10 GUESTS | $4,000.00 MIN
Our Pool Deck Booths place you eye-level with the party, pools, and elegance of Drai's world-class venue. Each of these spacious booths provides ample seating among some of the Beach Clubs most highly demanded real estate. You're view will blanket banks of waving palm trees over a thousand guests, with views of the strip in the background. Each of these booths has devoted storage areas.
Mezzanine Cabana
12 GUESTS | $5,000.00 MIN
Our North Mezzanine Cabanas place you on another level of luxury and privacy. You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Your gaze will be met with spellbinding views of the entire venue oscillating between hard drops and bass lines. Turn elsewhere and your sights will embrace the city towering beyond. Lounge on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of your cabana and let the party come to you. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.
- Private shower and bathroom
- Private pool access
- 55-inch LED flat screens
- Humidity adjusted fans
- Daybed

15 GUESTS | $5,500.00 MIN

You and your guests will have exclusive access to our stylish upper pool deck, including your own private bathroom and shower. Lounge out on your private daybed and soak it all in, or chill out in the stately luxury of Drai's largest cabana. Two nearby staircases provide easy access to the rest of the venue. These cabanas possess devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

eventtitle: Joe Kay: 4 Hour Night Swim Set
eventDescripton:
Event Details
Sit back and unwind at DAYLIGHT BEACH CLUB at The Mandalay Bay where you can ease into summer with a sprawling 50,000 square feet of space; there’s not a bad seat on the deck. Boasting a 4,400 square-foot main pool with two additional private pools for cabana guests, and table side daybed service on the pool level, DAYLIGHT BEACH CLUB is the place to be for a luxuriously entertaining pool experience. Sip on a hand crafted cocktail and enjoy some delicious, made-to-order, beach-side bites while soaking in the long-awaited summertime vibes.

Relax eye level to our 80-sided LED disco ball, with 7,000 square feet of additional LED wrapped around the venue and watch confetti and cryo-cannons rain down on the dance floor to the sound of world-class DJs. Each table possesses devoted storage cabinets and outlets for charging mobile devices.

Each of these high-end beds are equipped with wide umbrellas, multiple tables, and surrounded by additional seating. With a devoted staircase, you will be able to move seamlessly through the venue without having to sacrifice privacy.

Party hosts

Lounge
8 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
tables are located inside of our covered lower terrace area in proximaty of the bar and with full coverage from the sun.
Patio Daybed
8 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
s are similar to our beach couches but instead of being in the sand the table is located just behind the sand on our patio deck. Tables are rectangle or square loungers with umbrellas placed between tables.
Patio Small
2 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
Patio small tables are located around the perimeter of the pool on the patio. These are all in great locations and are recommended for smaller party sizes.
Daybed (Cabana Area)
8 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
* Your reservation was made at 11:00AM , and due to our venue's demand, we recommend early arrival. After 1PM your table is at risk to be released for resale.
These Daybeds are located in our south cabana vip area. Daybeds are round and have ample shade provided from our natural palm trees.
Beach Couch
8 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
* Guest must bring a printed copy of the email confirmation with scan-able ticket(s), valid photo I.D., and the credit card used to purchase the table
* Beach Couch and Beach Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right on the sand beach of the venue and right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are either round or square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
Dance Floor
10 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
tables are exactly what you would expect, they are right in the dance floor and directly in front of the DJ Booth. With enough room for up to 10 guests these tables will put you right in all the action.
Poolside Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* Your reservation was made at 11:00AM , and due to our venue's demand, we recommend early arrival. After 1PM your table is at risk to be released for resale.
* Poolside Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right next to the pool all within close proximatey to the stage, these are 4 of the best tables in the venue. Daybeds are round with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
VIP Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* VIP Daybeds are 2 of our best located table areas. With a slightly elevated patio right above the beach and unobstructed beach access. Located right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
South Cabana
12 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
* If applicable, all taxes are included if not specified.
* South Cabanas are located on the south end of the pool deck with a little bit more shade from natural palm trees. These are great if you want to hide from the sun. All cabanas come with refrigerators, tv's, and couches.
* Waitress, Busser, and security officer in your section to assist you for the night
East Cabanas
12 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
* Artists and event subject to change without notice.
* East Cabans are located at the beach entrance area of the club with direct views of the DJ booth and only a few steps away from our sand beach and walk in pool entrance. All cabanas come with refridgerators, tv's, and counches.
* All juice and soda mixers included (excluding craft mixers, which can be purchased at an addition charge).
Premium Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Processing fee is non-refundable under all circumstances.
* These are our largest and most luxurious cabanas. They are the closest cabanas to the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck. They come with refrigerators, T.V.'s, and a Large couch.
*The subtotal you prepay (excluding taxes, fees, and gratuity) will go toward a credit toward food and bottle service at your table the day of your reservation.
Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Guest must arrive by time specified on ticket for guaranteed entry.
* These are some best and most luxurious cabanas. They have great views of the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are also elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck.
* Table is yours for the entire day until 6pm closing unless released with your approval.
Stage
10 GUESTS | $20,000.00 MIN
* All Ticket/Table sales are final and nonrefundable.
* Stage tables are by request only and are our most exclusive area located right behind the dj booth.
* Expedited VIP Entry and admission to Elia Beach Club is complimentary with the purchase of a table

Event Details
Pool tour
11:30am- Check in at Go Pool at The Flamingo
2nd Pool- To be announced
3rd Pool- Elia Beach club at The Virgin hotel
You will arrive at the last pool between 2:30-3 pm. The tour ends at the last pool.
Package Includes:
Admission to 3 pool parties
Party bus transportation to the pools
Complimentary drinks and waters
Party hosts

Bottle Service
Bottle Menu Floor Plan
Table Reservations close at 10 am
Lounge
8 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
tables are located inside of our covered lower terrace area in proximaty of the bar and with full coverage from the sun.
Patio Daybed
8 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
s are similar to our beach couches but instead of being in the sand the table is located just behind the sand on our patio deck. Tables are rectangle or square loungers with umbrellas placed between tables.
Patio Small
2 GUESTS | $500.00 MIN
Patio small tables are located around the perimeter of the pool on the patio. These are all in great locations and are recommended for smaller party sizes.
Daybed (Cabana Area)
8 GUESTS | $1,000.00 MIN
* Your reservation was made at 11:00AM , and due to our venue's demand, we recommend early arrival. After 1PM your table is at risk to be released for resale.
These Daybeds are located in our south cabana vip area. Daybeds are round and have ample shade provided from our natural palm trees.
Beach Couch
8 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
* Guest must bring a printed copy of the email confirmation with scan-able ticket(s), valid photo I.D., and the credit card used to purchase the table
* Beach Couch and Beach Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right on the sand beach of the venue and right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are either round or square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
Dance Floor
10 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
tables are exactly what you would expect, they are right in the dance floor and directly in front of the DJ Booth. With enough room for up to 10 guests these tables will put you right in all the action.
Poolside Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* Your reservation was made at 11:00AM , and due to our venue's demand, we recommend early arrival. After 1PM your table is at risk to be released for resale.
* Poolside Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right next to the pool all within close proximatey to the stage, these are 4 of the best tables in the venue. Daybeds are round with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
VIP Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* VIP Daybeds are 2 of our best located table areas. With a slightly elevated patio right above the beach and unobstructed beach access. Located right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
South Cabana
12 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
* If applicable, all taxes are included if not specified.
* South Cabanas are located on the south end of the pool deck with a little bit more shade from natural palm trees. These are great if you want to hide from the sun. All cabanas come with refrigerators, tv's, and couches.
* Waitress, Busser, and security officer in your section to assist you for the night
East Cabanas
12 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
* Artists and event subject to change without notice.
* East Cabans are located at the beach entrance area of the club with direct views of the DJ booth and only a few steps away from our sand beach and walk in pool entrance. All cabanas come with refridgerators, tv's, and counches.
* All juice and soda mixers included (excluding craft mixers, which can be purchased at an addition charge).
Premium Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Processing fee is non-refundable under all circumstances.
* These are our largest and most luxurious cabanas. They are the closest cabanas to the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck. They come with refrigerators, T.V.'s, and a Large couch.
*The subtotal you prepay (excluding taxes, fees, and gratuity) will go toward a credit toward food and bottle service at your table the day of your reservation.
Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Guest must arrive by time specified on ticket for guaranteed entry.
* These are some best and most luxurious cabanas. They have great views of the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are also elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck.
* Table is yours for the entire day until 6pm closing unless released with your approval.
Stage
10 GUESTS | $20,000.00 MIN
* All Ticket/Table sales are final and nonrefundable.
* Stage tables are by request only and are our most exclusive area located right behind the dj booth.
* Expedited VIP Entry and admission to Elia Beach Club is complimentary with the purchase of a table

Event Details
Life is Beautiful returns to Downtown Las Vegas for another installment of the beloved music and arts festival. Taking place on the weekend of September 16-18, the 2022 edition will host headliners including Arctic Monkeys, Calvin Harris, Gorillaz, Lorde, Jack Harlow, Kygo, Migos, Cage The Elephant, and Beach House.
In addition to the headliners, attendees can look forward to other highly-anticipated sets from the likes of Sylvan Esso, SG Lewis, R3HAB, Charli XCX, Marc Rebillet, Alison Wonderland, and Jungle. House lovers will surely be getting down to the sensational sounds of Solardo, Sonny Fodera, Kyle Watson, Walker & Royce, and Jax Jones, while getting a dose of emotions from Bob Moses, Elderbrook, Jerro, and Cassian. Other artists such as Dabin, Said The Sky, Big Wild, and Phantoms are also sure to leave everyone impressed.

Event Details
Life is Beautiful returns to Downtown Las Vegas for another installment of the beloved music and arts festival. Taking place on the weekend of September 16-18, the 2022 edition will host headliners including Arctic Monkeys, Calvin Harris, Gorillaz, Lorde, Jack Harlow, Kygo, Migos, Cage The Elephant, and Beach House.
In addition to the headliners, attendees can look forward to other highly-anticipated sets from the likes of Sylvan Esso, SG Lewis, R3HAB, Charli XCX, Marc Rebillet, Alison Wonderland, and Jungle. House lovers will surely be getting down to the sensational sounds of Solardo, Sonny Fodera, Kyle Watson, Walker & Royce, and Jax Jones, while getting a dose of emotions from Bob Moses, Elderbrook, Jerro, and Cassian. Other artists such as Dabin, Said The Sky, Big Wild, and Phantoms are also sure to leave everyone impressed.

Event Details
Life is Beautiful returns to Downtown Las Vegas for another installment of the beloved music and arts festival. Taking place on the weekend of September 16-18, the 2022 edition will host headliners including Arctic Monkeys, Calvin Harris, Gorillaz, Lorde, Jack Harlow, Kygo, Migos, Cage The Elephant, and Beach House.
In addition to the headliners, attendees can look forward to other highly-anticipated sets from the likes of Sylvan Esso, SG Lewis, R3HAB, Charli XCX, Marc Rebillet, Alison Wonderland, and Jungle. House lovers will surely be getting down to the sensational sounds of Solardo, Sonny Fodera, Kyle Watson, Walker & Royce, and Jax Jones, while getting a dose of emotions from Bob Moses, Elderbrook, Jerro, and Cassian. Other artists such as Dabin, Said The Sky, Big Wild, and Phantoms are also sure to leave everyone impressed.

s are similar to our beach couches but instead of being in the sand the table is located just behind the sand on our patio deck. Tables are rectangle or square loungers with umbrellas placed between tables.

These Daybeds are located in our south cabana vip area. Daybeds are round and have ample shade provided from our natural palm trees.
Beach Couch
8 GUESTS | $1,200.00 MIN
* Guest must bring a printed copy of the email confirmation with scan-able ticket(s), valid photo I.D., and the credit card used to purchase the table
* Beach Couch and Beach Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right on the sand beach of the venue and right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are either round or square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
Dance Floor
10 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
tables are exactly what you would expect, they are right in the dance floor and directly in front of the DJ Booth. With enough room for up to 10 guests these tables will put you right in all the action.
Poolside Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* Your reservation was made at 11:00AM , and due to our venue's demand, we recommend early arrival. After 1PM your table is at risk to be released for resale.
* Poolside Daybeds are some of our best located table areas. Located right next to the pool all within close proximatey to the stage, these are 4 of the best tables in the venue. Daybeds are round with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
VIP Daybed
8 GUESTS | $1,500.00 MIN
* VIP Daybeds are 2 of our best located table areas. With a slightly elevated patio right above the beach and unobstructed beach access. Located right in front of the walk in sand filled pool. Daybeds are square with umbrellas located in the area of all beds.
South Cabana
12 GUESTS | $2,000.00 MIN
* If applicable, all taxes are included if not specified.
* South Cabanas are located on the south end of the pool deck with a little bit more shade from natural palm trees. These are great if you want to hide from the sun. All cabanas come with refrigerators, tv's, and couches.
* Waitress, Busser, and security officer in your section to assist you for the night
East Cabanas
12 GUESTS | $2,500.00 MIN
* Artists and event subject to change without notice.
* East Cabans are located at the beach entrance area of the club with direct views of the DJ booth and only a few steps away from our sand beach and walk in pool entrance. All cabanas come with refridgerators, tv's, and counches.
* All juice and soda mixers included (excluding craft mixers, which can be purchased at an addition charge).
Premium Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Processing fee is non-refundable under all circumstances.
* These are our largest and most luxurious cabanas. They are the closest cabanas to the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck. They come with refrigerators, T.V.'s, and a Large couch.
*The subtotal you prepay (excluding taxes, fees, and gratuity) will go toward a credit toward food and bottle service at your table the day of your reservation.
Cabanas North
12 GUESTS | $3,000.00 MIN
* Guest must arrive by time specified on ticket for guaranteed entry.
* These are some best and most luxurious cabanas. They have great views of the DJ booth with great views of the DJ booth and pool. They are also elevated approximately 2 to 3 feet above the rest of the pool deck.
* Table is yours for the entire day until 6pm closing unless released with your approval.
Stage
10 GUESTS | $20,000.00 MIN
* All Ticket/Table sales are final and nonrefundable.
* Stage tables are by request only and are our most exclusive area located right behind the dj booth.
* Expedited VIP Entry and admission to Elia Beach Club is complimentary with the purchase of a table

Event Details
Las Vegas transportation services offered in this limousine type include:
Point to point services:
Single stop trips made easy and convenient, as our service can drop you off and pick you up later on.
Dedicated chauffeur services:
Have the convenience of a dedicated Chauffeur for several hours or for the day as your agenda can change from one moment to the next.
Disclaimer:
* Hourly rates do not include driver gratuity, Nevada excise tax, fees or applicable fuel surcharges.
* Fuel surcharges are subject to change.
* This party bus requires a minimum 2-hour booking.
